question.title: wicket extend checkbox two-state to multi state
question.body:
how to create a checkbox in wicket with multi state?

for example: checked, not checked and "no action" (with gray background)

public enum PageType {
    ABOUT(1),
    CODING(2),
    DATABASES(3);

    private int value; 

    private PageType(int value) {
        this.value = value;
    }
}

Checkbox<PageType> chbk = new Checkbox<>("checkbox");
